TopicTitle: Remove Gimbaling from Basic Jet Engine?

Articles.Content: I always thought it was odd that a Squad part that classified itself as "basic" would have vectored thrust which is a terribly advanced feature in the human world. Also overwhelming My First Jet Plane type KSP creations are over sensitive in control which gimbling the engine just exacerbates.
This would make sense for the tech tree.
An excellent idea. I am sure they will introduce more jet engine parts in time as well.

I always thought it was odd that a Squad part that classified itself as "basic" would have vectored thrust which is a terribly advanced feature in the human world. Also overwhelming My First Jet Plane type KSP creations are over sensitive in control which gimbling the engine just exacerbates.

Tech tree balancing aside, I believe you can turn off gimbling on jet engines by right clicking on it and click "Lock Gimbal"
